picmol: Phase Instability Calculator for MOLecular design¶

API Reference:

  • Molecular Properties (picmol.get_molecular_properties)
    • add_molecule()
    • search_molecule()
    • load_molecular_properties()
  • Kirkwood-Buff Integral Analysis (picmol.kbi)
    • KBI
      • KBI.run()
      • KBI.T_sim
      • KBI.unique_mols
      • KBI.num_comp
      • KBI.mol_nums_by_component
      • KBI.total_num_mols
      • KBI.properties_by_molid
      • KBI.molar_vol
      • KBI.kbi_npt()
      • KBI.kbi_thermo_limit()
      • KBI.z
      • KBI.v
      • KBI.G_matrix()
      • KBI.B_matrix()
      • KBI.cofactors_Bij()
      • KBI.dmu_dN()
      • KBI.dmu_dxs()
      • KBI.dlngamma_dxs()
      • KBI.gammas()
      • KBI.GE()
      • KBI.GM()
      • KBI.Hmix()
      • KBI.SE()
  • Liquid-Liquid Equilibria (picmol.thermo_model)
  • Thermodynamic Models (picmol.models)
    • Flory-Huggins (picmol.models.fh)
    • NRTL (picmol.models.nrtl)
    • UNIQUAC (picmol.models.uniquac)
    • Numerical (picmol.models.numerical)
    • UNIFAC (picmol.models.unifac)
    • UNIFAC Subgroups (picmol.models.unifac_subgroups)
      • Subgroup Parameters (picmol.models.unifac_subgroups.unifac_subgroup_parameters)
      • Molecule Fragmentation (picmol.models.unifac_subgroups.fragmentation)
    • Convex Envelope Method (picmol.models.cem)
  • Plotting Functions (picmol.plotter)
  • Examples
